    • Method Detail

      • roll

        public void roll()
        Description copied from class: Die
        This method simulates the roll of the dice assigning a value between 1 and 6 to it. During a roll no thread can see the die, avoiding possible inconsistencies. For now I'll use a simple random generation. May use a different and less polarized algorithm in the future.
        Overrides:
        roll in class Die
